overview: “Gautam Mago is a Vice President with Sequoia Capital India. Prior to joining Sequoia Capital India, Gautam worked with McKinsey & Company in India and the US, where he served clients in the outsourcing, consumer goods and retail sectors. Prior to McKinsey, Gautam worked at Arthur Andersen in Mumbai. Gautam has an MBA from the Indian Institute of Management Calcutta, where he was awarded the institute’s gold medal and a Masters in Commerce from the University of Mumbai. Gautam is also a member of the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India.” (Source: Sequoia Capital)
